titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for rank awards for certain senior career employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

bill.summary: 10/5/2000--Introduced. Amends Federal Civil Service law to provide for annual awards of the rank of Meritorious Senior Professional or Distinguished Senior Professional to senior career employees for sustained accomplishment or sustained extraordinary accomplishment, respectively.
